body: I just wanted to say that I'm happy more people have been playing on Avicus! Now i see about 300-500 people! when a few weeks ago I used to see 100-200. Good job guys!
body_tagged: I just wanted to say that I'm happy more people have been playing on Avicus! Now i see about 300-500 people! when a few weeks ago I used to see 100-200. Good job guys!
title: I've noticed more people have been playing!!

replies.body: One of the weekends it peaked at 450
replies.body_tagged: One of the weekends it peaked at 450

replies.body: Haha im actually gonna change it to 300-500

replies.body:
Well we are getting more people since the update it seems.

Avicus is getting stronger again :)

replies.body: I swear, I was pretty high when I saw 400 players. Yeah, avicus is growing! Y'know after it lost about 95% of it's average online players.
replies.body_tagged: I swear, I was pretty high when I saw 400 players. Yeah, avicus is growing! Y'know after it lost about 95% of it's average online players.

replies.body:
Glad to see an optimistic post after such a long time :D It makes me cri with joy that Avicus is growing! Soon we will be on top of the WORLD!

Welp maybe not that big of a server but as long as we have such a loving community I'm glad to be part of it :') 

P.S. Welcome to all new players ^.^

replies.body:
Y'know, a couple months ago, during the time of wounded Avicus, the downfall of many players, somebody said: "Later, Avicus is gonna thrive and we're gonna look back, and laugh at how silly we were" (Not exact quote) 

Well, now I think, screw those doubts. Go Avicus :D

replies.body:
We're growing again! Ivy should add more things into the server so thing become more interesting, I saw over 500 people today, so, hope we get more!

P.S: We need more users in the forums too, so, hope they take a look here too.
